Package sage.input

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IInputManager
    This interface specifies the functions provided by an input manager implementation, independent of what underlying input package the input manager uses.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComponentStateInfo
    ComponentStateInfo stores state information for a specific component (key, button, or axis).
    InputEvent
    This class is designed to isolate the event mechanism used by an InputManager from the underlying event types of a device input package (for example, JInput -- which defines its own Event type).
    InputManager
    This class implements the IInputManager interface and acts as the central management point for all input devices available for controlling a game.
    ThirdPersonCameraController
    ThirdPersonCameraController defines an object which manages an "orbit camera"; that is, a third person camera which always looks at a given SceneNode, called the target, but which can be "orbited" around the target using an input controller such as a mouse or gamepad.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IInputManager.INPUT_ACTION_TYPE
    INPUT_ACTION_TYPE enumerates the possible manners in which an IAction associated with a button or key will be invoked when the button or key generates an input event.
